name: Vetting
description: Initial vetting stage to ensure application completeness and compliance with minimum standards (RMA S88). Reviews application form, required documents, fees, property details, and determines notification requirements.

name: Technical Assessment
description: Comprehensive technical assessment of the proposal against relevant planning instruments and RMA criteria. Includes analysis of environmental effects, expert reports, and stakeholder submissions.

name: Decision
description: Final decision-making stage including preparation of decision report, conditions drafting (S108AA), and notification of decision to applicant and submitters.

name: Implementation
description: Post-decision implementation including consent issuance, bond processing, compliance monitoring setup, and handover to monitoring team.

name: RFI Processing
description: Request for Information processing stage. Handles preparation, issuing, tracking, and assessment of RFI responses. Clock is suspended during this stage.

name: Notification
description: Public notification stage for notified consents. Manages public notice preparation, submission period, and submission processing.

name: Hearing
description: Hearing preparation and conduct for consents requiring a hearing. Includes commissioner appointment, hearing scheduling, and hearing report preparation.

name: S92 Response Review
description: Review and assessment of responses to S92 requests for further information. Determines if sufficient information has been provided to proceed with assessment.
